data.title: Literary Agents Los Angeles
data.meta_description: Literary Agents Los Angeles 2024-2025 - Find all California and LA literary agencies for authors in our book agent directory and database.
data.text:
Literary Agents in Los Angeles and California – USA Directory and Database 2024-2025​

Literary Agents in Los Angeles and California 2024-2025 – Get free access to our resources to get a Los Angeles literary agent. Our literary agent directory has a comprehensive list of literary agents in Los Angeles with detailed biographies and contact information. Inside you’ll find profiles for all Los Angeles literary agencies, California literary agencies, and California literary agents. The Literary Agent Directory also includes listings for the top literary agents in Los Angeles. Learn about our founder at Mark Malatesta, and click here to see Mark Malatesta Reviews.

Find CA and Los Angeles Literary Agents

Search our database of California and Los Angeles literary agents to submit your book to publishing agents such as:

Amy Schiffman

Bonnie Nadell

Dara Hyde

Debbie Deuble Hill

Helen Breitwieser

Jacquelyn Ross

Ken Sherman

Rebecca Friedman

Steven Fisher

Susan Finesman

Literary Agents Los Angeles and California – Free Agent Directory

Enter your first name and email address for instant access to listings for Los Angeles literary agents. You’ll discover which literary agents in Los Angeles are looking for new authors. In addition to location, you can search the Directory of Literary Agents by book genres, AAR status, and more. The directory has contact information for all literary agents in Los Angeles, along with photos and links to all literary agencies in Los Angeles. it also displays each agent’s preferred submission method since some agents accept email submissions, while others only accept postal mail and online form submissions.

Additional Resources to Get Literary Agents in Los Angeles Offering to Represent Your Book

After you enter The Directory of Literary Agents, you’ll be able to use our other resources for authors. Simply enter your first name and email address, and you’ll be able to access:

Our Audio Training Library (text transcripts available as well) with additional information to help you get the attention of literary agents in Los Angeles

The Ask a Question area of our main publishing website where you can submit questions about how to get a top literary agent, publisher, and book contract

Our Radio Show archives featuring recordings of interviews with special guests, publishing industry experts, and bestselling authors–generously sharing their best advice about how to be a more successful author

The Book Genre Dictionary with our book genre finder and detailed list of book genre definitions

The opportunity to register for an Author Coaching Call via phone or Skype (there is a fee required for this service)

Our email newsletter with Articles and Updates to help you get a Los Angeles literary agent
